name: i18next-icu
description: i18nFormat plugin to use ICU format with i18next

scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && rimraf locale-data
scripts.build:umd: rollup -c rollup.config.js --format umd && rollup -c rollup.config.js --format umd --uglify
scripts.build:amd: rollup -c rollup.config.js --format amd && rollup -c rollup.config.js --format umd --uglify
scripts.build:iife: rollup -c rollup.config.js --format iife && rollup -c rollup.config.js --format iife --uglify
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run copy && npm run copyLocale
scripts.build-win: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es-win && npm run build:umd && npm run copy-win
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push

author: Jan MÃ¼hlemann <jan.muehlemann@gmail.com> (https://github.com/jamuhl)
